fullText:

 Watch Jessica Vosk and Kelli Barrett Sing a Song From the Upcoming Broadway Musical Beaches 
 
 
 Broadway performances start on March 27 at the Majestic Theatre.
dtliExcerpt: Carell's performance anchors this thoughtful revival, bringing unexpected depth to Chekhov's melancholy masterpiece.
showScoreExcerpt: Carell's performance anchors this thoughtful revival, bringing unexpected depth to Chekhov's melancholy masterpiece.

llmScore.reasoning: [ensemble-majority] | 2/3 models agree: Positive | Claude: The critic uses clearly positive language calling it a 'thoughtful revival' and praising Carell's performance for bringing 'unexpected depth' to a 'masterpiece,' indicating a solid recommendation. | GPT-4o: The review highlights the performance as a key strength and refers to the production as a 'thoughtful revival' of a 'melancholy masterpiece', indicating a strong recommendation. | Gemini: The review highlights a strong performance and calls the production "thoughtful," indicating a positive assessment despite the melancholy nature of the play.

textIssues: Show title not found in text
rescoreReason: text-cleaning bug destroyed fullText during scoring
